title: Cursed goblin staff

properties.name: description
properties.value: A Cursed goblin staff is one of the three weapons released during Old School Runescape's fourth event: the Goblin Invasion. It was a drop from the goblin lieutenants found in the cave that the Varrock scout lead to.

A Cursed goblin staff is one of the three weapons released during Old School Runescape's fourth event: the Goblin Invasion. It was a drop from the goblin lieutenants found in the cave that the Varrock scout lead to.

It can now be bought from Diango for 45 coins.

The Cursed goblin staff is useful for players who want to train their Magic skill through splashing. A staff for autocast and a magic bonus of at most -64 is required for splashing. Normally a player can use green d'hide vambraces to achieve -64 magic bonus while wielding an elemental staff. Players who cannot equip the vambraces can still splash with this staff, at the cost of using more runes.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
6 March 2015
(update)

The cursed goblin staff has been tweaked slightly to prevent AFKing and griefing.

5 June 2014
(update)

Cursed goblin weapons that are available from Diango's toy store are now F2P items.

5 September 2013
(update)
  • The cursed goblin weaponry is now available from Diango's shop.
  • The item's value was increased from 3 to 30.
23 August 2013
(update)

Added as part of stage four of the 2013 Goblin Invasion.

[[File:Cursed goblin staff detail.png|left|110px]]
A '''Cursed goblin staff''' is one of the three [[weapons]] released during [[Old School RuneScape|Old School Runescape]]'s fourth event: the [[Goblin Invasion]]. It was a drop from the goblin lieutenants found in the cave that the [[Varrock]] scout lead to.

It can now be bought from [[Diango]] for 45 [[coins]].

The Cursed goblin staff is useful for players who want to train their [[Magic]] skill through [[splashing]]. A staff for [[autocast]] and a magic bonus of at most -64 is required for splashing. Normally a player can use [[green d'hide vambraces]] to achieve -64 magic bonus while wielding an [[elemental staff]]. Players who cannot equip the vambraces can still splash with this staff, at the cost of using more runes.
